positions.title: Therapist / Counselor – Head of Research & Clinical Development
positions.about: Psykick is a dual-facing mental health platform designed to bridge the gaps between therapy sessions. We provide clients with an AI-guided journaling experience and are building a dashboard for therapists to track progress, auto-generate notes, and detect emotional red flags.
positions.mission: Ensure Psykick remains clinically grounded and evidence-based. Guide features using CBT principles and real-world therapist workflows.
responsibilities: Lead qualitative user research with therapists, clients, and mental health orgs
Translate psychological theory (esp. CBT) into app features
Advise on emotional tracking and mental health red flag detection
Create ethical and clinical guidelines for prompts and summaries
Validate therapeutic interventions and their outcomes
Engage with mental health institutions and grant panels
requirements: Licensed therapist, counselor, psychologist or researcher
Familiarity with CBT and client management workflows
Passionate about digital mental health accessibility
Comfortable with ambiguity and fast iteration

positions.title: Technical Co-Founder – Full-Stack + LLM Developer
positions.about: We’ve launched a journaling app and are building a companion dashboard for therapists. Our goal is to enable structured journaling, session prep, and automated insights using AI—empowering therapists and enhancing mental healthcare delivery.
positions.mission: Build the technical foundation of Psykick’s journaling and therapist dashboard platforms, with secure LLM integration and scalable deployment.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain backend services (NestJS or equivalent)
Fine-tune and self-host LLMs for summarization and generation tasks
Optimize infrastructure for performance and security
Deploy apps to cloud infra like Vercel, AWS or GCP
Work closely with product and research teams to refine features
requirements: Hands-on experience deploying or fine-tuning LLMs
Familiarity with HuggingFace, Ollama, vLLM, etc.
Comfort with prompt engineering and embeddings
Experience with secure, scalable backend design
bonus: Knowledge of open-source LLMs (e.g., LLaMA 3, Mistral)
Experience in health/wellness or ethical AI projects
Use of Firebase, Supabase, or serverless infra
